metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10192 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in ffserver.c in FFmpeg before 2.8.10, 3.0.x before 3.0.5, 3.1.x before 3.1.6, and 3.2.x before 3.2.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging failure to check chunk size.

notes.Note: ebarretto> as of 2018-09-28, no equivalent fix for libav

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
